author: lundblad
msg: Late follow-up to r13756.  Change force to a more meaningful name in
libsvn_ra_svn, svnserve and the svn protocol documentation.
(ra_svn_lock_compat, ra_svn_lock): Change argument name force to steal_lock.
(ra_svn_unlock_compat, ra_svn_unlock): Change argument name force to
(lock, lock-many): Change parameter name from force to steal-lock.
(unlock, unlock-many): Change parameter name from force to break-lock.
(lock, lock_many): Change variable name from force to steal_lock.
(unlock, unlock_many): Change variable name from force to break_lock.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c: Add a newline to the end of
the file, to silence a compiler warning "no newline at end of file".

author: kfogel
msg: (append_prop_conflict): Convert conflict description from utf8 to
native fuzzily, since robustness is more important than accuracy.

author: ehu
msg: Revise svn_client_commit_item_t API to eliminate conflicting uses of its
This change separates the copyfrom-rev and revision uses for the revision
field in the svn_client_commit_item_t structure because both values are
required to correctly implement wc-replacements of versioned items.
Array manipulation is consistently implemented using the APR_ARRAY_* macros
even where the old code didn't.
svn_client_get_commit_log_t, but with a different contract: it takes
an array of svn_client_get_commit_log2_t structures in the
(svn_client_ctx_t): Add new log_msg_func2/log_msg_batton2 members for new
(svn_client__get_log_msg): New. Encapsulates backward compat callback call
(svn_client__get_log_msg): New. Utility function for backward compability
in case of a copied item.
